self_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon believes he will win due to his strength and ability to stop Prudnik's moves, especially in later rounds.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Devon plans to control the match and force Prudnik into uncomfortable positions.

Evgeny Prudnik.strength: Respects Prudnik's strength but believes he can stop him.
Evgeny Prudnik.previous_match_summary: References Prudnik's recent impressive matches but remains confident in his own abilities.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik is confident he can win by being explosive and avoiding the strap, potentially catching Devon off guard.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Plans to stay calm and avoid Devon's control tactics.

Devon Larratt.strength: Acknowledges Devon's strength but believes he can overcome it.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: References Devon's recent matches and injuries but remains confident.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: John believes Devon has the advantage but Prudnik could win if he executes perfectly.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Prudnik needs to avoid the strap and be explosive to have a chance.

Devon Larratt.strength: Very strong with excellent pronation stop.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: References Devon's recent training and strength.

Evgeny Prudnik.strength: Capable but needs to be perfect to win.
